attributes.action: grant automatic citizenship to any former of present member of the Gurkas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel the gurkas have earned the right to citizenship on more than one occasion and any serving member or former member of the Guerka regiment should be given citizenship and to be treated like any other member of the British Forces

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
